alerts.imageTooLarge: Image too large. Use files under 2MB.
alerts.noOpenWindows: No open link windows to save.
chat.hint: Enter to send, Shift+Enter for new line. Paste or attach images (max 2MB).
chat.inputPlaceholder: Write a message or paste an image...
chat.selectRoom: Select a room to get started.
chat.title: Chat rooms
dataCollection.hint: Shows outgoing requests and crash-report configuration while telemetry is enabled.
dataCollection.statusOff: Logging off. Enable crash reporting to capture outgoing data.
dataCollection.statusOn: Logging on. Outgoing collection events will appear below.
dataCollection.title: Data collection debugger
drop.title: Drop links to capture
fields.title: Title
health.label: Health
help.captureBody: Add a link with URL, optional title, tags, folder, priority, and notes. Use drag-and-drop or the clipboard banner to capture faster.
help.linksBody: Click a card to open its window. Use inline actions for open in browser, copy, edit, pin, favorite, or delete.
help.optionsBody: Use the gear for transparency, always-on-top, resizer injection, persistence, launch on startup, folder sync, storage file, background, reset, and telemetry.
help.paletteBody: Press Ctrl/Cmd+K to open the palette. Type to search, Enter to open, use action buttons, Esc to close.
help.quickAccessBody: Recents shows recently opened links. Frequently used ranks links by open count.
help.searchBody: Search filters by title, URL, tags, and notes. Toggle fuzzy/exact. Tag chips filter the list; right-click a chip to pin it.
help.shortcutsBody: Drag the top bar to move. Resize from edges (if resizers are enabled). Shortcuts: Ctrl/Cmd+K command palette; Ctrl+Alt+F search; Ctrl+Alt+L capture URL; Ctrl+Alt+O options; Ctrl+H help; Ctrl+Alt+T always on top; Ctrl+Alt+[ / ] opacity; Ctrl+Alt+Arrows resize; Ctrl+Alt+Shift+Arrows move; Ctrl+Alt+M maximize; Ctrl+Alt+C center; Ctrl+Alt+R reset (main window). Link windows: Alt+Left/Right (Windows/Linux) and Cmd+[ / Cmd+] (macOS) back/forward, Alt+R reload, Alt+B browser, Alt+C copy URL, Alt+S copy selection, mouse back/forward buttons.
help.title: Transparent AI Client help
help.workspacesBody: Save workspace captures currently open link windows and their positions. Open restores them; delete removes the workspace.
hints.tagsComma: Tags help organize and power quick filters (comma separated).
layout.subtitle: Live map of open windows and focus
layout.title: Window layout
links.emptyHint: Add a link above to get started
metadata.label: Metadata
palette.hint: Enter to open. Up/Down to navigate. Esc to close.
palette.title: Command palette
placeholders.paletteSearch: Search links or type to filter
prompts.bulkTags: Enter comma-separated tags to apply to selected links. Leave blank to clear existing tags.
settings.alwaysOnTopHint: When enabled windows will be kept above other apps
settings.appNameHint: Shown in the title bar of the main window.
settings.backgroundHint: Pick an image to use behind the main window UI.
settings.developerModeHint: Shows a live window with startup timings and responsiveness metrics.
settings.windowLayoutHint: Open a live map of open windows and their positions.
settings.injectResizers: Inject resizer handles into opened link pages
settings.injectResizersHint: When disabled, injected resizers for external pages will not be added (use keyboard shortcuts instead)
settings.languageHint: Changes the UI language (translation support may be limited).
settings.launchOnStartupHint: Automatically start Transparent AI Client when you sign in to your computer
settings.linkSessionHint: Controls whether link windows share cookies or keep separate logins.
settings.linksStorageHint: Point Transparent AI Client at a different links.json file or open the current file to edit it manually.
settings.nativeTransparencyHint: Uses Electron native transparency; restart required to apply
settings.opacityHint: Adjust transparency for all currently open windows
settings.persistSettingsHint: Save your options so they persist across restarts
settings.telemetryHint: Help improve the app by sending anonymous crash reports. Data is opt-in and can be revoked anytime.
settings.useFolderSync: Enable folder sync (save links to a synced folder)
settings.useFolderSyncHint: Store links.json in a folder synced by OneDrive/Google Drive. Choose a folder below.
